trans-unit.source: A container timeline that provides object and property targeting information for its child animations.
trans-unit.target: En beholder tidslinje som gir objekt og har informasjon for de underordnede animasjonene-egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: ## Interactively Controlling Storyboards A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed.
trans-unit.target: ##Interaktivt kontrollerer dreiebøker kontrollert dreieboken kan stoppe, gjenoppta, søker etter, stoppe og fjernes.

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in markup, you specify the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> object that creates it; for an example, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For å gjøre en dreiebok kontrollert i markup, angir du den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>objekt som oppretter den; for eksempel se [slik: Bruk hendelsesutløsere til å kontrollere en dreieboken etter den starter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: For å gjøre en dreiebok kontrollert i koden, må du bruke passende overbelastning av dreieboken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>metoden og angi `true` å gjøre det kontrolleres.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel se [slik: kontrollere en dreieboken etter den starter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Data Binding and Animating Timelines Most timeline properties can be data bound or animated; however, because of the way the timing system works, data bound or animated timelines do not behave like other data bound or animated objects.
trans-unit.target: Databinding og animere tidslinjer mest kan tidslinjen ikke data bundet eller animerte; imidlertid fordi systemet tidsberegning fungerer, data bundet eller animerte tidslinjer ikke fungerer kanskje som andre data bundet eller animerte objekter.

trans-unit.source: To understand their behavior, it helps to understand what it means to activate a timeline.
trans-unit.target: For å forstå virkemåten, bør du vite hva det vil si å aktivere en tidsplan.

trans-unit.source: When a timeline is activated, copies are made of the timeline and its child timelines.
trans-unit.target: Når en tidslinje er aktivert, utføres kopier av tidslinjen og de underordnede tidsplaner.

trans-unit.source: These copies are frozen (made read-only) and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created from them.
trans-unit.target: Disse Kopier er låst (skrivebeskyttet) og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objekter opprettes fra dem.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks do the actual work of animating the targeted properties.
trans-unit.target: Disse klokkene gjør det faktiske arbeidet for å animere egenskapene mål.

trans-unit.source: If a timeline is data bound or animated, a snapshot of its current values is made when its clock is created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en tidsplan er bundet til data eller animerte, et øyeblikksbilde av de gjeldende verdiene gjøres når klokken opprettes.

trans-unit.source: Even though the original timeline might continue to change, its clock does not.
trans-unit.target: Selv om den opprinnelige tidslinjen kan fortsette å endre, klokken ikke.

trans-unit.source: For a timeline to reflect data binding or animation changes, its clock must be re-created.
trans-unit.target: For en tidsplan å gjenspeile dataendringer bindingen eller animasjonen må klokken opprettes på nytt.

trans-unit.source: Clocks are not re-created for you automatically.
trans-unit.target: Klokker opprettes ikke på nytt for deg automatisk.

trans-unit.source: The following are several ways to apply timeline changes: - If the timeline is or belongs to a Storyboard, you can make it reflect changes by reapplying its storyboard using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Følgende er flere måter å bruke tidslinjen endres:-Hvis tidslinjen eller tilhører en dreiebok, kan du gjøre det gjenspeile endringene ved å utføre den dreieboken ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: This has the side effect of also restarting the animation.
trans-unit.target: Dette er at av også starte animasjonen.

trans-unit.source: In code, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A> method to advance the storyboard back to its previous position.
trans-unit.target: I kode, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A>metode for å gå videre dreieboken tilbake til forrige posisjon.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If you applied an animation directly to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> method, call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> method again and pass it the animation that has been modified.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du har brukt en animasjon direkte til en egenskap med den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>metoden, kall den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>metoden på nytt og sende den animasjonen er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If you are working directly at the clock level, create and apply a new set of clocks and use them to replace the previous set of created clocks.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du arbeider direkte på klokken-nivå, må du opprette og bruke et nytt sett med klokker og bruke dem til å erstatte tidligere settet med opprettet klokker.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a data bound animation, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) .
trans-unit.target: For et eksempel på en bundet animasjonen, kan du se [nøkkelen Spline animasjonen utvalg](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) .

trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Storyboards started with this method cannot be paused, resumed, or otherwise interactively controlled after they are started.
trans-unit.target: Dreiebøker i gang med denne metoden kan ikke stanset, gjenopptatt eller ellers interaktivt kontrolleres etter at de er startet.

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must specify the same `containingObject` when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: For å styre denne dreieboken interaktivt, må du angi den samme `containingObject` når du kaller interaktive metodene som du brukte til å starte dreieboken når denne metoden kalles, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objekter som opprettes for dreieboken og noen tidsplaner den inneholder.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Disse klokkene lagres med `containingObject`.

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Start et dreieboken utløser i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.target: Et objekt som er innenfor det samme navn omfanget som mål for denne dreieboken animasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Animations without a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*> are applied to `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Animasjoner uten en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>gjelder `containingObject`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the storyboard should be interactively controllable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dreieboken skal kontrolleres interaktivt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets and initiates them, using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder animasjoner som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> til målene og starter dem, ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>til en egenskap som bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, noen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objektene tidligere knyttet til egenskapen fortsette å bruke systemressurser; tidsberegning systemet ikke fjerner disse klokkene automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Unngå ytelsesproblemer når du bruker et stort antall klokker ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, bør du fjerne oppbygging klokker fra egenskapen animerte når overføringen er fullført.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes flere måter å fjerne en klokken.

trans-unit.source: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil fjerne alle klokker fra en egenskap, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>metoden for animerte-objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen blir animerte som første parameter, og `null` som sekundet.

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Dette fjerner alle animasjonen klokker fra egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -For å fjerne en bestemt <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>fra en liste over klokker, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>egenskapen for til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>å hente en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>kalle <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjøres ofte det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>hendelsesbehandlingen for en klokken.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at bare roten klokker styres av en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>for en underordnet klokken returnerer `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Legg også merke som den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>hendelsen kalles ikke hvis gjeldende varigheten for klokken er kontinuerlig.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet må brukeren bestemme når å kalle <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Dette er primært et problem for animasjoner for objekter som har en lang levetid.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Når et objekt er ugyldige samlet, klokkene også er frakoblet og ugyldige samlet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om klokken objekter, se [tidsberegning System oversikt over og animasjonen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Animasjoner uten en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>gjelder `containingObject`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the storyboard should be interactively controllable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dreieboken skal kontrolleres interaktivt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets within the specified template and initiates them.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder animasjoner som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> til målene i den angitte malen og starter dem.

trans-unit.source: If the targeted properties are already animated, they are replaced using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> handoff behavior.
trans-unit.target: Hvis de angitte egenskapene er allerede animerte, de blir erstattet med den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>handoff virkemåte.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metoden kalles, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objekter som opprettes for dreieboken og noen tidsplaner den inneholder.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Disse klokkene lagres med `containingObject`.

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Start et dreieboken utløser i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: The object to which the specified `frameworkTemplate` has been applied.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som den angitte `frameworkTemplate` er brukt.

trans-unit.source: Animations without a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*> are applied to `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Animasjoner uten en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>gjelder `containingObject`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>

trans-unit.source: The template to animate.
trans-unit.target: Malen til å animere.

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets and initiates them, using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder animasjoner som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> til målene og starter dem, ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An object contained within the same name scope as the targets of this storyboard's animations.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som er innenfor det samme navn omfanget som mål for denne dreieboken animasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Animations without a specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*> are applied to `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Animasjoner uten et angitt <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>gjelder `containingObject`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>

trans-unit.source: The behavior the new animation should use to interact with any current animations.
trans-unit.target: Virkemåten nye animasjonen skal bruke til å kommunisere med noen gjeldende animasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets and initiates them, using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder animasjoner som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> til målene og starter dem, ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the targeted properties are already animated, they are replaced using the specified handoff behavior.
trans-unit.target: Hvis de angitte egenskapene er allerede animerte, erstattes med den angitte handoff virkemåten.

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must specify the same `containingObject` when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: For å styre denne dreieboken interaktivt, må du angi den samme `containingObject` når du kaller interaktive metodene som du brukte til å starte dreieboken når denne metoden kalles, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objekter som opprettes for dreieboken og noen tidsplaner den inneholder.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Disse klokkene lagres med `containingObject`.

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Start et dreieboken utløser i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av den skrive HandoffBehavior når du bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>til en egenskap som bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, noen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objektene tidligere knyttet til egenskapen fortsette å bruke systemressurser; tidsberegning systemet ikke fjerner disse klokkene automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Unngå ytelsesproblemer når du bruker et stort antall klokker ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, bør du fjerne oppbygging klokker fra egenskapen animerte når overføringen er fullført.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes flere måter å fjerne en klokken.

trans-unit.source: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil fjerne alle klokker fra en egenskap, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>metoden for animerte-objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen blir animerte som første parameter, og `null` som sekundet.

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Dette fjerner alle animasjonen klokker fra egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -For å fjerne en bestemt <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>fra en liste over klokker, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>egenskapen for til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>å hente en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>kalle <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjøres ofte det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>hendelsesbehandlingen for en klokken.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at bare roten klokker styres av en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>for en underordnet klokken returnerer `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Legg også merke som den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>hendelsen kalles ikke hvis gjeldende varigheten for klokken er kontinuerlig.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet må brukeren bestemme når å kalle <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Dette er primært et problem for animasjoner for objekter som har en lang levetid.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Når et objekt er ugyldige samlet, klokkene også er frakoblet og ugyldige samlet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om klokken objekter, se [tidsberegning System oversikt over og animasjonen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: For å styre denne dreieboken interaktivt, må du bruke samme `containingObject` parameteren når du kaller interaktive metodene som du brukte til å starte dreieboken når denne metoden kalles, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objekter som opprettes for dreieboken og noen tidsplaner den inneholder.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Disse klokkene lagres med `containingObject`.

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Start et dreieboken utløser i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av den skrive HandoffBehavior når du bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>til en egenskap som bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, noen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objektene tidligere knyttet til egenskapen fortsette å bruke systemressurser; tidsberegning systemet ikke fjerner disse klokkene automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Unngå ytelsesproblemer når du bruker et stort antall klokker ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, bør du fjerne oppbygging klokker fra egenskapen animerte når overføringen er fullført.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes flere måter å fjerne en klokken.

trans-unit.source: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil fjerne alle klokker fra en egenskap, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>metoden for animerte-objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen blir animerte som første parameter, og `null` som sekundet.

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Dette fjerner alle animasjonen klokker fra egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -For å fjerne en bestemt <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>fra en liste over klokker, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>egenskapen for til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>å hente en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>kalle <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjøres ofte det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>hendelsesbehandlingen for en klokken.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at bare roten klokker styres av en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>for en underordnet klokken returnerer `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Legg også merke som den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>hendelsen kalles ikke hvis gjeldende varigheten for klokken er kontinuerlig.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet må brukeren bestemme når å kalle <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Dette er primært et problem for animasjoner for objekter som har en lang levetid.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Når et objekt er ugyldige samlet, klokkene også er frakoblet og ugyldige samlet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om klokken objekter, se [tidsberegning System oversikt over og animasjonen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An object contained within the same name scope as the targets of this storyboard's animations.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som er innenfor det samme navn omfanget som mål for denne dreieboken animasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Animations without a specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*> are applied to `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Animasjoner uten et angitt <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>gjelder `containingObject`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>

trans-unit.source: The behavior the new animation should use to interact with any current animations.
trans-unit.target: Virkemåten nye animasjonen skal bruke til å kommunisere med noen gjeldende animasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Declares whether the animation is controllable (can be paused) once started.
trans-unit.target: Angir om animasjonen er kontrollert (kan være midlertidig) når den er startet.

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets within the specified template and initiates them.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder animasjoner som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> til målene i den angitte malen og starter dem.

trans-unit.source: The object to which the specified `frameworkTemplate` has been applied.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som den angitte `frameworkTemplate` er brukt.

trans-unit.source: Animations without a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*> are applied to `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: Animasjoner uten en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>gjelder `containingObject`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>

trans-unit.source: The template to animate.
trans-unit.target: Malen til å animere.

trans-unit.source: The behavior the new animation should use to interact with any current animations.
trans-unit.target: Virkemåten nye animasjonen skal bruke til å kommunisere med noen gjeldende animasjoner.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the storyboard should be interactively controllable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dreieboken skal kontrolleres interaktivt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstance%2A> when creating new instances of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> class for the various cloning methods (such as <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden internt av <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstance%2A>ved oppretting av nye forekomster av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>klasse for flere kloning metoder (eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> that was created for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> som ble opprettet for dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>

trans-unit.source: The current global speed, or 0 if the clock is stopped.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende globale hastighet og 0 Hvis klokken er stoppet.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> that was created for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> som ble opprettet for dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>

trans-unit.source: A clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A> speed is the rate at which its time is currently progressing, compared to real-world time.
trans-unit.target: En klokken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>er hastigheten som pågår for øyeblikket tiden, sammenlignes virkelige tid.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To use this method to retrieve information about a storyboard's clock, the storyboard must be controllable.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke denne metoden til å hente informasjon om en dreiebok klokken, må dreieboken være kontrolleres.

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: For å gjøre en dreiebok kontrollert i koden, må du bruke passende overbelastning av dreieboken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>metoden og angi `true` å gjøre det kontrolleres.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel se [slik: kontrollere en dreieboken etter den starter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The object specified when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%28System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method was called.
trans-unit.target: Objektet angitt når den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%28System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement%2CSystem.Boolean%29> metoden ble kalt.

trans-unit.source: This object contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> objects that were created for this storyboard and its children.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet inneholder den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> objekter som ble opprettet for denne dreieboken og de underordnede objektene.

trans-unit.source: The current global speed, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the clock is stopped.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende globale hastigheten, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis klokken er stoppet.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> that was created for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> som ble opprettet for dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>

trans-unit.source: A clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A> speed is the rate at which its time is currently progressing, compared to real-world time.
trans-unit.target: En klokken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>er hastigheten som pågår for øyeblikket tiden, sammenlignes virkelige tid.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To use this method to retrieve information about a storyboard's clock, the storyboard must be controllable.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke denne metoden til å hente informasjon om en dreiebok klokken, må dreieboken være kontrolleres.

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: For å gjøre en dreiebok kontrollert i koden, må du bruke passende overbelastning av dreieboken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>metoden og angi `true` å gjøre det kontrolleres.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel se [slik: kontrollere en dreieboken etter den starter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The current global speed, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the clock is stopped.

trans-unit.source: A clock's first iteration has a value of 1.
trans-unit.target: En klokken første gjentakelse har verdien 1.

trans-unit.source: If this storyboard has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A> setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne dreieboken har en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>at `true`fullstendig gjentakelse består av Videresend-snu to, ikke bare ett av disse segmenter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of its current iteration, seeking a clock returns its current iteration to 1.
trans-unit.target: Uavhengig av den gjeldende gjentakelsen returnerer søking en klokken den gjeldende gjentakelsen til 1.

trans-unit.source: Restarting a clock also returns its current iteration to 1.
trans-unit.target: Starte en klokken også returnerer den gjeldende gjentakelsen til 1.
